thread.section_title: Hotel Arc de Triomphe Etoile - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Amazing hotel
thread.title_full: Amazing hotel - Review of Hotel Arc de Triomphe Etoile, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Nikki A
title: Amazing hotel
text: We left this lovely hotel less than an hour ago and already want to go back, the rooms aren't huge but super modern and clean with everything you need. The staff go above and beyond to help with everything. The breakfast is great and great rate and all you can eat which is good if your partners like mine haha, I/we will be back !!
